subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller spent the off-season forming a large and costly support team to help him try to surpass Phil Mahre as the most successful American man  to compete on Alpine skiing’s grueling World Cup circuit.
snippet: Bode Miller spent the off-season forming a large and costly support team to help him try to surpass Phil Mahre as the most successful American man  to compete on Alpine skiing’s grueling World Cup circuit.
